title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 44.4 - Prohibition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 44.4 - Prohibition

State Regulations

No milk dealer shall sell or deliver milk, except on a
cash-on-delivery basis, to a milk dealer who has failed to make full payment on
or before the final date prescribed under section
44.3
of this Part for milk
purchased or received from any milk dealer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
44.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
